HypePhrases.label: Hype Phrases
HypePhrases.tooltip: Comma delimited list of phrases to monitor to increment hype. Will match exactly (including spaces). Leave this completely blank and turn off 'CountIndividualMatch' to increment Hype for all received messages

HypeLevelCount.label: Hype Level Match Count
HypeLevelCount.tooltip: How many phrase matches per LookbackMinutes is considered 100% hype

CountIndividualMatch.label: Count Individual Match
CountIndividualMatch.tooltip: Should multiple phrase matches in a single message be counted multiple times? If yes, check this box

LookbackMinutes.label: Lookback Minutes
LookbackMinutes.tooltip: How long to lookback to calculate hype level

ClipAtMaxHype.label: Clip At Max Hype
ClipAtMaxHype.tooltip: Should Hype Values higher than 100% be disabled? Turn this on to lock max value at ceiling of 100

ResetOnMaxHype.label: Reset On Max Hype
ResetOnMaxHype.tooltip: Start the meter back at zero whenever hype level reaches 100+

ResetDelaySeconds.label: Reset Delay Seconds
ResetDelaySeconds.tooltip: How many seconds after Max Hype to wait before resetting. Value of 0 will reset as soon as possible. Only works if Reset On Max Hype Enabled

CooldownSeconds.label: After Reset Cooldown Seconds
CooldownSeconds.tooltip: How many seconds to wait after a reset before resuming tracking again. Value of 0 means start again immediately. Only works if Reset On Max Hype Enabled

CommandPermission.label: Command Permission
CommandPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the !freezehypemeter, !unfreezehypemeter, and !maxhypemeter commands

SwitchSceneOnMaxHype.label: Switch Scene On Max Hype
SwitchSceneOnMaxHype.tooltip: Enter the name of a scene here to switch to it once the hype level reaches 100+. Leave blank to do nothing

SwitchSceneDelaySeconds.label: Switch Scene Delay Seconds
SwitchSceneDelaySeconds.tooltip: How long after max hype to wait before switching the scene. Value of zero will switch scene as soon as possible

EnableSourceOnMaxHype.label: Enable Source On Max Hype
EnableSourceOnMaxHype.tooltip: Enter the name of a source to turn on once hype level reaches 100+. Leave blank to do nothing

EnableSourceDelaySeconds.label: Enable Source Delay Seconds
EnableSourceDelaySeconds.tooltip: How long after max hype to wait before enabling the source. Value of zero will enable source as soon as possible

EnabledSourceSeconds.label: Enabled Source Seconds
EnabledSourceSeconds.tooltip: How many seconds to leave the source enabled after end of Enable Source Delay Seconds. Value of 0 will leave the source on permanently

BlockLengthSeconds.label: Block Length Seconds
BlockLengthSeconds.tooltip: Phrase matches are grouped in chunks of this duration. The oldest chunk is dropped off the back of the list after lookback minutes is hit. A smaller number here is more responsive but takes more resources

TickTimeSeconds.label: Tick Time Seconds
TickTimeSeconds.tooltip: How often should the overlay be updated?
